file.name: course-enrollments.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: Course Enrollments
  description: "Course Enrollments API"
  contact:
    email: anton93lev@gmail.com
  version: 0.0.1-SNAPSHOT
tags:
  - name: Course Enrollments
    description: Course Enrollments API
paths:
  /courses/{uuid}/course-enrollments:
    post:
      tags:
        - Course Enrollments
      summary: Enroll to course
      description: Enroll to course
      operationId: enrollToCourse
      parameters:
        - name: uuid
          in: path
          description: Course UUID
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: uuid
          example: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001
      requestBody:
        description: Student username. It's temp solution before implementing user module.
        content:
          '*/*':
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CourseEnrollmentRequest'
        required: true
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Enrolled to course.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CourseEnrollment'
        '404':
          description: Course not found.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiErrorResponse'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected server error.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiErrorResponse'
  /course-enrollments:
    get:
      tags:
        - Course Enrollments
      summary: List Course Enrollments
      description: List Course Enrollments
      operationId: courseEnrollments
      responses:
        '200':
          description: List of course enrollments returned.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CourseEnrollmentDTO'
        '500':
          description: Unexpected server error.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiErrorResponse'
components:
  schemas:
    CourseEnrollmentRequest:
      description: Course enrollment request
      type: object
      properties:
        uuid:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          description: Student username.
          example: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001
    CourseEnrollment:
      description: Course enrollment
      type: object
      properties:
        uuid:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          description: Course Enrollment UUID.
          example: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001
    CourseEnrollmentDTO:
      description: Course enrollment
      type: object
      properties:
        uuid:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          description: Course enrollment UUID.
          example: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001
        course:
          type: string
          format: uuid
          description: Course UUID.
          example: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001
        student:
          type: string
          description: Student name.
          example: name
        completionStatus:
          type: string
          description: Completion status.
          example: IN_PROGRESS
          enum: [IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED]
    RestApiError:
      type: object
      required:
        - code
        - message
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
          example: ErrorCode
          description: Error code.
        details:
          type: array
          description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiError'
        innererror:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/InnerError'
        message:
          type: string
          example: Validation issues
          description: A human-readable representation of the error.
        target:
          type: string
          example: field
          description: The target of the error.
      title: RestApiError
      description: REST API Error.
    RestApiErrorResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        error:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/RestApiError'
      title: RestApiErrorResponse
      description: REST API Error Response. Full description about error response is represented in https://github.com/microsoft/api-guidelines/blob/vNext/Guidelines.md#7102-error-condition-responses
    InnerError:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
          example: ErrorCode
          description: Error code.
        innererror:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/InnerError'
      title: InnerError
      description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Error: notImplemented: path "/courses/{uuid}/course-enrollments": post: requestBody: contents: unsupported content types: [*/*]
